response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This product holds significant value to both of us, with an estimated worth of $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to proceed, you can acquire this remarkable product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 7200}
